The high: end estimate of global deaths from the 1918 Spanish flu pandemic is around 100 million, which is significantly lower than the claim made by President Trump.
Different estimates from reputable sourc: such as a 1991 report in the Bulletin of the History of Medicine, suggest that the death toll from the 1918 Spanish flu pandemic was around 30 million, not 100 million.
